scripts.build: powershell -Command "Write-Host 'Building project...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; if (!(Test-Path dist)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path dist | Out-Null }; Copy-Item -Path public\* -Destination dist\ -Recurse -Force; Write-Host 'Build complete! Output: dist/' -ForegroundColor Green"
scripts.postversion: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const pkg=require('./package.json');fs.writeFileSync('public/package.json',JSON.stringify({name:pkg.name,version:pkg.version},null,2))" && git add public/package.json && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push --force-with-lease && git push --tags
